alert.note: Alert for Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WASHBURN AND NORTHWESTERN SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trego, or 11 miles northeast of Spooner, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hayward and Little Round Lake around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Northwoods Beach, Lac Courte Oreilles, Stanberry, Earl, Springbrook, Grindstone Lake, Lampson, Reserve and Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
